entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dalhousie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
